column1: Thanks to Catron county for the warm welcome yesterday! #nm02 #nmpol https://t.co/LGl8KnEOr8
Had a great time visiting with the people of Socorro today! As I ramp up for November it's wonderful to see so many friends ready to hit the ground running. #nm02 #nmpol https://t.co/G5x0IwPKOD

On Sunday I was proud to endorse @benraylujan to be New Mexico's next Senator. He is a tireless advocate for his district who fights for New Mexican values. I know he will bring the same type of leadership next year to the Senate #nmpol https://t.co/ykzjdKbx4I
Wonderful to kick off my 2020 campaign last weekend with a room full of fired up supporters! It was great to see old friends and many new faces. #nmpol #nm02 https://t.co/5e659MSZf6
We're so excited to be kicking off the 2020 cycle with Ben Ray Luján! https://t.co/evKdkr68vz

Let’s be real here — the most common use of the word “complexion” refers to skin color. Our words have consequences and the only reasonable response is to apologize. Dog whistles have no place in New Mexican politics. https://t.co/0tKhYXZerr
@RussContreras @haussamen @RussContreras @haussamen Autocorrect just doesn’t get southern New Mexico #chile #redorgreen
